items.sentence: My apartment is more comfortable than yours.
My grandfather is five times as old as I am.
I don\'t think I can swim across this river.
I don\'t think you should go there with Tom.
I don\'t usually eat lunch until about 2:30.
I don\'t want Tom to go to Boston with Mary.
What was the real reason for Tom\'s refusal?
Tom is so quiet you never know he\'s around.
I don\'t know what I\'ll do after Christmas.
It\'s raining, so please take your umbrella.
I go back home to Boston every three months.
I got a letter from an old friend yesterday.
I got tired of listening to Tom complaining.
I hate carrots even more than I hate onions.
I have a client waiting in the waiting room.
I have a deposit of a thousand dollars here.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary graduated from.
Tom said he\'d love to go to Boston with us.
Tom said he\'d meet us in the lobby at 2:30.
I don\'t have time for a vacation this year.
